short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A companion Chrome Extension to the Spotilize web app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension activates the Spotilize web app, an app built for visualizing your Spotify library. With beautiful visuals and full screen support, run this extension on a large monitor or computer hooked up to a television to really set the mood. Dance along or just listen and stare, Spotilize is here to enhance your Spotify experience.
